activity.name: document product
activity.description: develop the presentation of the form, fit, and functional requirements of a product in the form of a drawing.

activity.name: configure drawing view
activity.description: create and annotate the views of the 2D draughting shape model that are presented on a drawing sheet.

activity.name: configure drawing sheet
activity.description: select, locate, and orient drawing views with respect to a drawing sheet, annotate the drawing sheet, and approve the drawing sheet as required by any organization-specific practices.

activity.name: configure drawing
activity.description: order the sheets of the drawing, add product information that is relative to the entire drawing to each sheet in the form of annotation, and approve the drawing.

activity.name: configure 2D draughting shape model
activity.description: analyze the view requirements and modify, as necessary, the 2D draughting shape model to support these views.

activity.name: create model view
activity.description: define the perspective from which the model will be viewed and specify any clipping required to limit the view to only those desired elements.

activity.name: create drawing view
activity.description: scale and place a view of a 2D draughting shape model on the drawing sheet and configure and place annotation on the view as required to present product information. The appearance of any elements of the 2D draughting shape model presented in the view maybe modified to accurately portray product shape.

activity.name: select drawing sheet layout and size
activity.description: specify the size of a drawing sheet to be used in the drawing and any standard drawing layout to be included on that sheet.

activity.name: position drawing views
activity.description: locate and orient drawing views on a drawing sheet.

activity.name: annotate drawing sheet
activity.description: select and apply a drawing sheet layout, as required, to the drawing sheet and annotate this drawing sheet with related administrative product information and any necessary additional annotation that is not related to a specific view.

activity.name: document drawing sheet approval
activity.description: annotate a drawing sheet with an organization or project-specific approval.

icom.name: 2D draughting shape model
icom.description: the two-dimensional representation, at any stage of development, of the physical shape and size of a product that has been produced or created for the purpose of presentation in a drawing.

icom.name: annotated drawing sheet
icom.description: a drawing sheet that may contain drawing views and their view-related annotation, as well as annotation not related to a specific view, such as the drawing sheet layout and administrative product information.

icom.name: annotated drawing view
icom.description: a view of the 2D draughting shape model that contains annotation related to the geometric data presented in the view.

icom.name: approved drawing sheet
icom.description: a drawing sheet to which an organization or project specific approval has been assigned.

icom.name: CAD system
icom.description: a computer system used for creation, revision, storage, and control of CAD drawings created from a 2D draughting shape model with explicit annotation.

icom.name: change requests
icom.description: detailed information and instructions issued to a draughtsman to create or modify a drawing.

icom.name: draughting standards
icom.description: organization, project, national, or international standards that specify the manner in which product information is depicted in a drawing.

icom.name: draughtsman
icom.description: a person responsible for documenting a product who makes use of a CAD system to create or modify a drawing.

icom.name: drawing requirements
icom.description: constraints on the configuration, contents, or appearance of a drawing, from the organization, project or both.

icom.name: drawing sheet
icom.description: a subdivision of a drawing that is presented as an image on a single piece of paper or other suitable output medium.

icom.name: existing CAD drawing
icom.description: a CAD drawing that is to be modified in response to a change request.

icom.name: existing drawing sheet
icom.description: a drawing sheet that is to be modified in response to a change request.

icom.name: existing drawing view
icom.description: a drawing view that is to be modified in response to a change request.

icom.name: model view
icom.description: a two-dimensional planar projection of a 2D draughting shape model from a specified position within its coordinate system. A view may include clipping in order to capture only certain elements of the object being viewed.

icom.name: non-shape product information
icom.description: information that describes physical aspects, functional aspects, or both, of a product other than its physical shape.

icom.name: organization/project requirements
icom.description: requirements imposed by an organization or a project that define the creation or modification of a drawing.

icom.name: product information
icom.description: information that describes the physical or functional aspects of a product.

icom.name: refined 2D draughting shape model
icom.description: the representation of the physical shape of a product that supports all draughting requirements for the presentation of that shape on a drawing.

icom.name: revised CAD drawing
icom.description: a CAD drawing which has been modified in response to a change request. An organization or project specific approval may have been assigned to the CAD drawing as well.

icom.name: sheet approval requirements
icom.description: requirements that govern the approval of drawing sheets for an organization, a project, or both.

icom.name: sheet layout and size requirements
icom.description: requirements that constrain the layout, the sheet size, or both, of drawing sheets for an organization, a project, or both.

icom.name: sheet layout symbol
icom.description: a symbol used to present standard drawing layouts.

icom.name: sheet requirements
icom.description: requirements that constrain the configuration, the content, the appearance, or all three of Drawing sheets for an organization, a project, or both.

icom.name: sheet with layout
icom.description: a drawing sheet that has been annotated with a sheet layout symbol.

icom.name: sheet with views
icom.description: a drawing sheet that contains one or more drawing views annotated as required.

icom.name: sheet without views
icom.description: a drawing sheet that does not contain any drawing views.

icom.name: symbols and fonts
icom.description: collections of text fonts, symbol fonts, and other symbol definitions that are used as annotation by a draughtsman in the creation or modification of a CAD drawing.

icom.name: unapproved drawing sheet
icom.description: a drawing sheet to which no organization or project specific approval has been assigned.

icom.name: view location requirements
icom.description: requirements that constrain the positioning of drawing views on a drawing sheet for an organization, a project, or both.

icom.name: view requirements
icom.description: requirements that constrain the contents, the appearance, or both of drawing views for an organization, a project, or both.
